languages.text: "Вы представитель дворянства, вам особенно должна быть ясна вопиющая несправедливость и неприемлемость этой ситуации. Поэтому я подумал — быть может, вы бы могли мне как-то посодействовать? Ради дружбы с будущим владельцем состояния Беллардо — то есть мной. И ради справедливости, конечно!"

"You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"
languages.original_text: "Вы представитель дворянства, вам особенно должна быть ясна вопиющая несправедливость и неприемлемость этой ситуации. Поэтому я подумал — быть может, вы бы могли мне как-то посодействовать? Ради дружбы с будущим владельцем состояния Беллардо — то есть мной. И ради справедливости, конечно!"

traits.locale_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realize just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future owner of the Bellardos' fortune — myself. And for the sake of justice, of course!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realize just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future owner of the Bellardos' fortune — myself. And for the sake of justice, of course!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realize just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realize just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: “你是个贵族。就算这些人不明白，你也肯定能意识到，这种情况是多么不对劲，多么不可接受。所以我在想，或许你能以某种方式向我伸出援手？我将成为贝拉多的财富未来的继承人，或许你愿意看在我们之间友谊的份上帮帮我？当然，也是看在公道的份上！”
languages.original_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"

traits.locale_text: “你是个贵族。就算这些人不明白，你也肯定能意识到，这种情况是多么不对劲，多么不可接受。所以我在想，或许你能以某种方式向我伸出援手？我将成为贝拉多的财富未来的继承人，或许你愿意看在我们之间友谊的份上帮帮我？当然，也是看在公道的份上！”
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: «Usted es noble. Como tal, debe comprender lo impropia e inaceptable que es esta situación. Por lo tanto, pensé que podría echarme una mano de alguna forma. A cambio, obtendrá la amistad del futuro dueño de la fortuna de Bellardo: yo. ¡Y la justicia, claro!».
languages.original_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"

traits.locale_text: «Usted es noble. Como tal, debe comprender lo impropia e inaceptable que es esta situación. Por lo tanto, pensé que podría echarme una mano de alguna forma. A cambio, obtendrá la amistad del futuro dueño de la fortuna de Bellardo: yo. ¡Y la justicia, claro!».
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: 「あんたは貴族の出だ。この状況がいかにおかしいか、あんたならわかるだろう。そこで、だ…どうにか手を貸してくれないかね？ベラルドの財産の未来の管理者である俺との友好のためにね。そしてもちろん、正義のために！」
languages.original_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたは貴族の出だ。この状況がいかにおかしいか、あんたならわかるだろう。そこで、だ…どうにか手を貸してくれないかね？ベラルドの財産の未来の管理者である俺との友好のためにね。そしてもちろん、正義のために！」
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: "Ihr seid von Adel – Ihr müsstet erkennen, wie falsch und inakzeptabel diese Situation ist. Darum dachte ich ... Ihr könntet mich vielleicht irgendwie unterstützen? Für den zukünftigen Verwalter des Bellardo-Vermögens – mich. Und für die Gerechtigkeit, versteht sich!"
languages.original_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid von Adel – Ihr müsstet erkennen, wie falsch und inakzeptabel diese Situation ist. Darum dachte ich ... Ihr könntet mich vielleicht irgendwie unterstützen? Für den zukünftigen Verwalter des Bellardo-Vermögens – mich. Und für die Gerechtigkeit, versteht sich!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: « Étant de la noblesse, vous devez bien vous rendre compte que cette situation est totalement inacceptable et frôle l'abus. J'espérais donc que vous pourriez m'aider ? Au nom de l'amitié avec le futur bénéficiaire de la fortune des Bellardo... autrement dit, moi. Et au nom de la justice, bien sûr ! »
languages.original_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"

traits.locale_text: « Étant de la noblesse, vous devez bien vous rendre compte que cette situation est totalement inacceptable et frôle l'abus. J'espérais donc que vous pourriez m'aider ? Au nom de l'amitié avec le futur bénéficiaire de la fortune des Bellardo... autrement dit, moi. Et au nom de la justice, bien sûr ! »
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: "Siz de asilzadesiniz. Bu durumun ne kadar yanlış ve kabul edilemez olduğunu herkesten iyi anlarsınız. Ben de düşündüm ki belki bana bir yardım eli uzatırsınız. Bellardo servetinin gelecekteki sahibi, yani benimle olan dostluğunuz hatrına. Bir de adalet adına tabii!"
languages.original_text: "You're nobility — you, of all people, must realise just how wrong and unacceptable this situation is. So I thought — maybe you could lend me a hand somehow? For the sake of friendship with the future keeper of the Bellardo fortune — me. And for the sake of justice, of course!"

traits.locale_text: "Siz soylusunuz. Herkesi geçtim ama sizin bu durumun ne kadar yanlış ve kabul edilemez olduğunu anlamanız gerekir. Ben de düşündüm ki, belki bana yardım edebilirsiniz. Bellardo servetinin gelecekteki sahibi, yani benimle olan dostluğunuz uğruna. Bir de adalet uğruna tabii!"
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion
